name: squared
description: Converts HTML and SVG into any mobile or desktop UI with the flexibility and accuracy of Chrome. CSS Grid, Flexbox, and CSS/SMIL animations are supported in the Android framework.

scripts.bundles: node build.js -f android -o dist/bundles/squared.android.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node build.js -f android -m svg -o dist/bundles/squared+svg.android.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node build.js -f android -e android.widget.* -o dist/bundles/squared.android+widget.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node build.js -f android -m svg -e android.widget.* -o dist/bundles/squared+svg.android+widget.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node build.js -f chrome -o dist/bundles/squared.chrome.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node build.js -f chrome -m svg -o dist/bundles/squared+svg.chrome.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js
scripts.dev-base: tsc -p ./tsconfig.base.json && rollup -c rollup.config.dev-base.js && cd ./android-framework && rollup -c rollup.config.dev.js
scripts.dev: tsc -p ./tsconfig.dev.json && rollup -c rollup.config.dev.js && cd ./android-framework && rollup -c rollup.config.dev.js && cd ../chrome-framework && rollup -c rollup.config.js
scripts.prod: npm run clean && eslint **/*.ts && tsc -p ./tsconfig.prod.json && rollup -c rollup.config.dev.js && rollup -c rollup.config.js && cd ./node-express && eslint **/*.ts && tsc && cd ../build && terser app.js -c toplevel -m -o ../app.js && terser build.js -o ../build.js && cd ../android-framework && rollup -c rollup.config.dev.js && rollup -c rollup.config.js && cd ../android-widget && rollup -c rollup.config.js && cd ../chrome-framework && rollup -c rollup.config.dev.js && rollup -c rollup.config.js && cd ../ && npm run bundles
scripts.clean: rimraf build/* && rimraf dist/* && rimraf temp/*
